programme.title: He Is Mine
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When his wife is kidnapped, Akin Richard’s life takes a terrible turn and he slips into depression. His revival and will to live comes from the love and affection from Sandra’s half-sister, Angela. After one year of mourning and sorrowing, they fall in love, and encouraged by the family, they get married. Akin is overjoyed until he receives a call that Sandra has been rescued alive; she is not dead after all.

programme.title: Adùnní
programme.desc: Adunni struggles with the weight of a secret she carries, but when she finds out her secret isn’t limited to just her alone, she find the inner strength to seek justice and speak out.

programme.title: Self Sentence
programme.desc: Sani, a financial auditor, promises his wife, halima, that he will allow her to work after they get married. He starts to make things difficult for her when he gets unnecessarily suspicious of halima, thinking that she is having an affair with her boss, mr. Patrick asuquo.

programme.title: Fashion Insider Season 1 - Emmanuel Goodnews
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Hurdles
programme.desc: An arrogant, fastidious and yet successful young lady eventually meets her match. To her dismay, he is unnerved by her attitude, flouts her rules and refuses to bend to her will, causing him to get under her skin.

programme.title: Beauty Of A Wife Material
programme.desc: A story of a couple, desperate to have children, decide to go down the route of surrogacy which almost destroys their marriage.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk Season 7 - Chidera David
programme.desc: Brand new season with A list Nollywood celebrities! Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits it's all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: The Pizza Guy
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Jessica, finding herself at the crossroads of her life decides to dive headfirst into dating, but doesn’t have much luck. Just when she’s about to give up, she meets George, a charismatic pizza delivery guy. As their connection deepens, Jessica decides to date George in secret, fearing judgement from her friends. Will her insecurity let love blossom or will it die out?

programme.title: The Will
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Benita's world is turned upside down when she finds out that she is the daughter of a wealthy businessman who recently died. She is invited to the reading of his will but his family make things very hostile for her.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 5
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her '6-Cardinal Rules'. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 6
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her '6-Cardinal Rules'. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: My Chances
programme.desc: The loving marriage of Bryan and Jemima starts to show cracks when Bryan loses his job and they seek help from their landlord, Donald. Donald takes a liking to Jemima and offers her a job leading Bryan to begin to feel neglected.

programme.title: Fashion Insider S1 - Simisanyaa
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Vicious Circle
programme.desc: A married philanderer begins to have an affair with a married woman, causing both their homes to drastically fall part and fatality.

programme.title: Too Late
programme.desc: A man constantly cheats on his girlfriend with no remorse, believing she will always forgive him and take him back, until one day he takes things too far and she decides to move on. He does all he can to get her back but is it too late?

programme.title: Humble Pie
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A down-on-their luck couple turn to a life of crime, calling themselves Bonnie and Clyde, when the man loses his job due to unfortunate circumstances. Their crimes lead the to a bickering couple, Eric and Zara, and the chance meeting has everyone re-evaluating their actions.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: When soft spoken and timid Temisan’s world turns upside down and her former loving husband starts to abuse her physically and verbally. She starts to find a seething rage building up inside her.
